# buttons

**Instance Property**

The buttons in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.

## Declaration

```swift
var buttons: [String : GCControllerButtonInput] { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCInputXboxPaddleOne-offv] constant to get the P1 paddle button for an Xbox controller.

```swift
button = physicalInputProfile.buttons[GCInputXboxPaddleOne]
```

For more button names, see [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/extended-gamepad-input-names] and [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/xbox-controller-input-names].

## Accessing elements by name or key

- **elements**: The elements in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **axes**: The axes in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **dpads**: The directional pads in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **touchpads**: The touchpads in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
- **subscript(_:)**: Returns the element that the key specifies.

items.description: The elements in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.
